claim_card.claim: A unified differential invariant is asserted: ∇·Φ = 0, framed as global conservation of coherence flux analogous to energy-momentum continuity.
claim_card.test_hook: Check whether the invariant is well-defined under the paper’s field definitions; test its conservation numerically in at least one simulated system.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Both regimes satisfy the same differential invariant
